# Sam Penwarden

Samuel Isaac Penwarden (July 19, 1885 – May 23, 1930) was a Canadian curler. He was the third of the 1928 Brier Champion team (skipped by Gordon Hudson), representing Manitoba. He died in 1930 of pneumonia.
